Text: Unfortunately, the manner in which these writings are being skewed, and perverted, these days, it is anything but Noble. It is time for good Muslims to come out against the use of these writings as a Terrorist Manifesto.

Quite the opposite I_QBot.  It is the western world that has turned their freemasonic constitutions and economic idols into terrorist manifestos upon which to attack, conquer, exploit, and oppress the peoples of the third world.  Islam, and the instructions of the Quran are the last line of defense against this madness that in all likelihood affords you your "way of life" and "standard of living" ? the true meanings behind illusory words such as ?democracy? and ?freedom? ? a vague concept represented by the right to do porn as opposed to the right to speak the truth.


And why should ye not fight in the cause of Allah and of those who, being weak, are ill-treated (and oppressed)?- Men, women, and children, whose cry is: "Our Lord! Rescue us from this town, whose people are oppressors; and raise for us from thee one who will protect; and raise for us from thee one who will help!" (Quran 4:75)


"The Unbelievers are protectors, one of another: Unless ye do this, (protect each other), there would be tumult and oppression on earth, and great mischief" (Quran 8:73)


To those who leave their homes in the cause of Allah, after suffering oppression,- We will assuredly give a goodly home in this world; but truly the reward of the Hereafter will be greater. If they only realised (this)! (Quran 16:41)

It is the avowed intention of Islam to convert everybody - by force, if necessary. Leaving aside that I for one refuse to convert to any religion, the thought of being under the yoke of a philosophy as tyrannical, backwards, ignorant and otherwise despicable as that contained in the repugnant Quran is something I won't tolerate.
